name: BirdBlast:Vill
description:
The game is set in a field in which player has to destroy the contaminated black birds that are going to be harmful to the land. Be careful not to shoot down the white birds as they are the good ones.

Control:

A - MoveLeft

D - MoveRight

MoveCursor - Change Direction 

MouseClick - Shoot

Note*

This game is a side project of an original game that is currently developing.

All assets are created by ROK1006.

Developed by ROK1006.
